name: Lazy Cat Adventure(Abbi Jam)
description:
MADE IN 48 HOURS

XBOX360 GamePad-(both analog sticks and the X,B,A Buttons for dance moves).
Esc will pause or unpause you, I promise..

KEYBOARD- (WASD + Mouse, and Z,X,C for dance moves) Start will Pause and UnPause..

Game Features a "Pause Menu", I think "Pause Menus" will be
the next big thing in video  game dev!!

Bugs-Sometimes the mouse cursor lock acts up, you have to pause, unpause
and it should fix it if it does.
